𓏘 𓏘 𓏘 𓇤 | heap | 𒋫𒉘𒈬 ta-ram-mu taramu 𓇾 terra ϩⲟⲣϫ⳼ ⲑⲁⲗ > tell

𒀝𒁍𒋢 𒈪𒈲 𒆳𒈬𒀫
ak-bu-su mi-ṣir KUR.mu-ṣur
akbusu miṣir Mosur ( 𓇥𓂋 𒈪𒈲 miṣir "border" ) akeᵐbuṭu 𓃀 miter 𓇾 Mutzur 𓆎 𓅓 𓏏 𓊖 I set foot on the territory of Misir
